sub_title: Assistant Professor Terrorism and Political Violence, Faculty of Governance and Global Affairs, Leiden University. Editor in Chief - International Centre for Counter Terrorism (The Hague)
summary:
I am an Assistant Professor Terrorism and Political Violence at Faculty of Governance and Global Affairs (FGGA), Leiden University, Senior Project Coordinator/Editor in Chief at the International Centre for Counterterrorism (ICCT), and an Adjunct Lecturer at Johns Hopkins University. My research focuses primarily on terrorism and counterterrorism, with a specialization in the roles of women, and gender dynamics. More recently, I have also focused on non-state actor governance. I hold the following affiliations:

• Editorial Board, Studies in Conflict and Terrorism Studies (Taylor and Francis) 
• Editorial Board, Terrorism and Political Violence (Taylor and Francis) 
• Editorial board, “Studies in Contemporary Warfare Series,” IB Tauris (Bloomsbury)  
• Associate Fellow, Department of War Studies, King’s College London
• Associate Fellow, the International Centre for the Study of Radicalisation, King’s College London
• Non-resident Fellow at the Program on Extremism at George Washington University
• Senior Research Fellow, Canadian Network for the Study of Terrorism, Security and Society (TSAS)  
• Board Member, Research Stream Coordinator, Women in International Security (WIIS) Netherlands
• Digital Fellow, Montreal Institute for Genocide and Human Rights Studies (MIGS), Concordia University 
• Advisory Board, International Counter-terrorism Review
• Member, Women in International Security (WIIS) UK and Canada 
• Member, Women know MENA
• Member, British-Yemeni Society (BYS) 
• Member, Women in Defense and Security Canada (WiDS)  

My first book, “A woman’s place: U.S. counterterrorism since 9/11” was published in 2020 with Oxford University Press (Hurst Publishers). My second, co-exited volume “‘The Rule is for none but Allah’: Islamist approaches to governance” focuses on Islamist Governance (both state and non-state actors) with co-editor Shiraz Maher (Hurst 2022). I have published numerous academic and policy publications on security, counterterrorism and human security published (full list below). I have been featured on or in CNN, Newsweek, The Telegraph, The Guardian, The Washington Post, Time, The Huffington Post, Radio Free Europe, The National Post and on BBC World News, Sky News and CBC, amongst others. I am a Canuck, and a nerd.

Twitter: @Joana_Cook
Website: www.joanacook.com
Book: https://www.amazon.co.uk/Womans-Place-U-S-Counterterrorism-Since/dp/1787381315
Book: https://www.hurstpublishers.com/book/the-rule-is-for-none-but-allah/

** Please note I will only respond to messages sent to my Leiden University email **
